mapper.select: select r.no, r.recipe_no as recipeNo, r.login_user_no as loginUserNo, r.comments, to_char(r.reg_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as regDate, to_char(r.updatedate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as updateDate, u.nickname as nickName from rcomments_t r, ruser_t u where r.login_user_no = u.no and recipe_no = #{recipeNo} order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into rcomments_t(no, recipe_no, comments, login_user_no) values(rcomments_t_no_seq.nextval, #{recipeNo}, #{comments}, #{loginUserNo})
mapper.update: update rcomments_t set comments = #{comments}, updatedate = sysdate where no = #{no}
